entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Percé
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:24 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High zero.
